snippets.title: In-preview editor shortcuts
snippets.content:
f: focus the selected node.
t: enable/disable the position gizmo.
r: enable/disable the rotation gizmo.
w: enable/disable the scaling gizmo.
i: toggle isolated mode (select a mesh and press 'i', 'escape' to exit).
suppr.: remove the selected node.
Ctrl+c / Command+c: copy the selected node.
Ctrl+v / Command+v: paste previously copied node (instances for meshes).

snippets.title: Global editor shortcuts
snippets.content:
Ctrl+s / Command+s: save the project.
Ctrl+f / Command+f: find a node or run a command.
Ctrl+r / Command+r: run the app in integrated browser.
Ctrl+b / Command+b: build the project.
Ctrl+g / Command+g: generate project outputs.
Ctrl+Shift+r / Command+Shift+r: build and run.
Ctrl+z / Command+z: undo.
Ctrl+y / Command+Shift+z: redo.
